text: Bill Hader was so close to beating his usual giggle fit when he reprised his beloved role as Stefon during his return to “ Weekend Update ” while hosting “ SNL ” Saturday. And then John Mulaney had to go and ruin everything. Hader is known for never being able to keep it together while playing this particular character, but while appearing on “ Late Night with Seth Meyers ” Monday, the late - night sketch show alum explained he almost got through it until Mulaney showed up as Stefon ’ s lawyer ( and “ conceptual piss artist ” ) “ He whispered in my ear to make me laugh, ” Hader told Seth Meyers, laughing even then. “ He said, ‘ My girlfriend works at Yoshinoya Beef Bowl, ’ which is a restaurant chain in L.
